From: Patrick Bunney <WarBarge@...>

:: Wolfgang ::

Damn!  I must go back to the base.

:: Looks to Masabot and remembers his treachery ::

Masabot, I will return to the Iron Fist.  But, because of your treatchery, I
will leave you here to fend for yourself.  This will be a test of loyalty. 
If you survive without dishonoring me, you shall be accepted.  If you die,
or survive dishonorably, well, there will be hell to pay.  Good luck, young
apprentice.

:: Starts to fire up his rockets. ::
________________________________________________________________

:: Rainchark ::

:: Rainchark sees the base.  It is less than a mile away. ::
